parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "DLIO",
"software": [
"COBALT",
"TensorFlow",
"MPICH",
"Darshan",
"Python"
],
"resources": [
"CPU",
"GPU (optional)",
"Memory",
"Network",
"Storage"
],
"details": {
"COBALT": "A workload manager used for allocating resources and managing jobs on a cluster.",
"TensorFlow": "An open-source machine learning framework used for developing and deploying machine learning models.",
"MPICH": "A high-performance message passing interface (MPI) implementation used for parallel computing.",
"Darshan": "A performance analysis tool used for collecting and analyzing I/O performance data.",
"Python": "A general-purpose programming language used for developing the DLIO benchmark application.",
"CPU": "The script utilizes a large number of cores (64) and threads (128) on the cluster.",
"GPU": "The script does not explicitly mention GPU usage, but it may be optional depending on the DLIO benchmark configuration.",
"Memory": "The script accesses data from a shared file system (/projects/datascience/dhari/dlio_datasets) suggesting a requirement for a substantial amount of memory.",
"Network": "The script utilizes MPICH for communication between processes, indicating a reliance on high-speed network connectivity.",
"Storage": "The script accesses data from a shared file system (/projects/datascience/dhari/dlio_datasets) and uses Darshsan to monitor I/O performance, signifying a need for reliable and high-throughput storage."
}
}
```
